Translations.Text: sura nos sent down nos decretum juris. Nos revealed clear revelations ut vos take heed
adulteress adulterer vos whip each de them centum lashes Non swayed de pity carrying deus juris si vos enim believe in DEUS Extremum Feria! let group believers testis their penalty
adulterer finis maritus adulteress idol worshiper adulteress finis maritus adulterer idol worshiper! Hoc prohibited believers
Those accuse copulatus femina adultery tunc fail produce 4 testis vos whip them 80 lashes non accept any testimony ex them; they est wicked
they repent afterwards reform tunc DEUS est Forgiver Merciful
Prout pro those accuse their suus conjux any alius testis tunc testimony accepted he juravit DEUS 4 temporis he telling truth
oath est incur deus condemnation eum he lying
She considered innocent she juravit DEUS 4 temporis he est liar
oath incur deus wrath eam he telling truth
Hoc est deus gratia mercy vos! DEUS est Redeemer Wise

gang vos produced big lie Non think it est malus vos; instead it est bonus pro vos. Meanwhile each unus de them earned his share guilt. Prout pro 1 qui initiated whole incident he incurred terrible retribution
When vos heard it believing vir believing femina habet bonus thoughts themselves dictus Hoc est obviously big lie
Unus they produced 4 testis (vos believe them)! they fail produce testis tunc they est DEUS liars
Si it est pro deus gratia vos His mercy in hoc saeculum Hereafter vos suffered major retribution hoc incident
Vos fabricated it tuus suus tongues rest de vos repeated it tuus mouths sine proof Vos thought est simple when it est DEUS gross
When vos heard it vos dictus Nos non repeat hoc. Glory est Vos. Hoc est gross falsehood
DEUS admonishes VOS UT VOS NUNQUAM PERFECIT it again VOS est believers
DEUS SIC explains revelations VOS. DEUS est Omniscient Wise
Those love vide immorality spread believers incurred painful retribution in hoc vita Hereafter DEUS knows DUM VOS NON know
DEUS showers VOS His GRATIA mercy! DEUS est GENERIS towards believers Merciful
